channel.title: [317 DELTA] Clicking interface buttons! [Rep++]
channel.description:
Okay so i've made custom interfaces with custom buttons.
I'm made 2 types of each button.
One regular image for when you're not clicking it, and the same image just glossed over for when you click it.
I know how to make it so if they click it, it shows the glossed image but
I want there to be an "accept" button.
So they click "dragon claws" image. it shows and highlights the NEW "dragon claws" image.
Then if they have it selected and they want it, they can click confirm and it will give them the dragon claws.
Any idea on how to add this confirm button? I will rep++

Dude, I posted in this section to get help. Not offer it.

If you can’t help me, don’t post on my thread.

item.title: [317 DELTA] Clicking interface buttons! [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Okay lets say I have an Online Shop interface.

dragon claws show up in the shop (as a custom interface button)

They click the d claws.
It now shows a new interface.
(same interface, but with new dclaws pic [highlighted d claws])
